title: Guy Pearce splits from wife of 18 years
text:
*Los Angeles:* 'Iron Man 3' actor Guy Pearce, who married his childhood sweetheart Kate Mestitz in 1997, has confirmed their split after 18 years of marriage.
Pearce took to Twitter to confirm the split and said that the couple "parted ways back in January", reports aceshowbiz.com.
